title: Job Posting Schema
description: Structured data representing information extracted from job postings, including text, markdown, or JSON formats.

job_ad_id.title: Job Ad ID
job_ad_id.description: Unique identifier for the job posting from the input data. Set null if not specified.

job_title.title: Job Title
job_title.description: The title or name of the job position being advertised (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Project Manager').

source_url.title: Source URL
source_url.description: The URL where the job posting was originally published.

content_language.title: Content Language
content_language.description: The primary languages of the job posting, represented by a two-letter ISO language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'de' for German).

is_informal_text.title: Informal Text
is_informal_text.description: Indicates if the job posting is written in an informal tone (e.g. using 'du' or 'Du' in German)

employment_type.title: Employment Type
employment_type.description: Specifies the type of employment in terms of working hours per week.

contract_type.title: Contract Type
contract_type.description: Specifies the type of employment contract.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The expected or exact start date for the position, which could be 'immediately' or a specific date.

application_deadline.title: Application Deadline
application_deadline.description: The final date for submitting applications.

travel_requirement_specified.title: Travel Requirement Specified
travel_requirement_specified.description: Indicates if traveling is required for the job.

travel_requirement_frequency.title: Travel Requirement Frequency
travel_requirement_frequency.description: The percentage of time that travel is required for the job.

career_level.title: Career Level
career_level.description: The experience or seniority level expected for the role.

company_name.title: Company Name
company_name.description: The name of the company offering the job.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The primary industry sector of the company.

company_size.title: Company Size
company_size.description: The size of the company based on the number of employees.

min_salary.title: Minimum Salary
min_salary.description: The minimum salary offered for the job, if specified.

max_salary.title: Maximum Salary
max_salary.description: The maximum salary offered for the job, if specified.

salary_frequency.title: Salary Frequency
salary_frequency.description: The frequency at which the salary is paid.

working_time.title: Working Hours
working_time.description: The expected daily start and end times for work.

working_model.title: Working Model
working_model.description: The working hours model, specifying whether the role offers flexible or fixed hours.

location.title: Location
location.description: The name of the job location (e.g., name of a building, area, or landmark).

location_street_and_number.title: Street and Number
location_street_and_number.description: The street name and number of the job location.

location_postcode.title: Postcode
location_postcode.description: The postal code for the job location.

location_city.title: City
location_city.description: The city where the job is located.

location_country.title: Country
location_country.description: The name of the country where the job is located. Do not use any kind of abbrevation, like an ISO-Code.

location_longitude.title: Longitude
location_longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the job location.

location_latitude.title: Latitude
location_latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the job location.

working_hours_per_week.title: Working Hours Per Week
working_hours_per_week.description: The total number of hours expected to be worked per week.

work_location_type.title: Work Location Type
work_location_type.description: Specifies whether the job is onsite, remote, or a hybrid of both.

remote_work_share.title: Remote Work Share
remote_work_share.description: The percentage of work that can be done remotely or in home office.

education_requirement.title: Education Requirement
education_requirement.description: The minimum level of education required for the job.

required_skills.title: Required Skills
required_skills.description: A list of essential generalized skills needed for the role, excluding tools, languages, or certifications.

tools_technologies.title: Tools and Technologies
tools_technologies.description: A list of essential tools, frameworks, programming languages and technologies relevant to the job, written in general terms.

certifications_licenses.title: Certifications and Licenses
certifications_licenses.description: A list of generalized certificates and licenses and similar qualifications required for the job.

language_skills.title: Language Skills
language_skills.description: A key-value mapping of languages required for the job, including generalized proficiency levels (e.g. English: Business fluent, German: fluent, French: is a plus)

years_of_experience.title: Years of Experience
years_of_experience.description: The number of years of professional experience required for the job position.

job_summary.title: Job Responsibilities Summary
job_summary.description: A 2-sentence summary of the main tasks and responsibilities of the job, written in the third person and limited to 150 characters.

team_size.title: Team Size
team_size.description: The size of the team the job andidate will be working with.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: A list of the job benefits provided, written in the third person and limited using genralised terms.

office_desk_policy.title: Office Desk Policy
office_desk_policy.description: A description of the office desk policy (e.g., 'shared desk office', 'private office').

company_summary.title: Company Summary
company_summary.description: A 2-sentence summary of the company, its mission, and values, written in the third person and limited to 150 characters.

company_culture.title: Company Culture
company_culture.description: A 2-sentence summary of the company's culture, written in the third person and limited to 150 characters.

esg_initiatives.title: ESG Initiatives
esg_initiatives.description: A 2-sentence summary of the company's environmental, social and governance (ESG) initiatives, principles and focus, written in the third person using generalised terms and limited to 150 characters.

diversity_policy.title: Diversity Policy
diversity_policy.description: A 2-sentence summary of the company's diversity and inclusion principles, initiatives and focus, written in the third person using generalised terms and limited to 150 characters.

application_process.title: Application Process
application_process.description: A list of the steps of the applciation involved in the job application process after applying for the job, written in the third person using generalised terms.

contact_person_name.title: Contact Person Name
contact_person_name.description: The name of the person responsible for handling job applications.

contact_person_phone.title: Contact Person Phone
contact_person_phone.description: The phone number for the job application contact person.

contact_person_email.title: Contact Person Email
contact_person_email.description: The email address for the job application contact person.

company_website.title: Company Website
company_website.description: The URL of the company's official website.
